GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14.208 to before v4.14.233
GSD.description:
powerpc/64s: Fix crashes when toggling entry flush barrier

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.233 by commit ee4b7aab93c2631c3bb0753023c5dda592bb666b, it was introduced in version v4.14.208 by commit db01cad9efe3c3838a6b3a3f68affd295c4b92d6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: powerpc/64s: Fix crashes when toggling entry flush barrier
